name: Big Batch Summer Burgers
description: We love the full flavour of these burgers made with our Burger Seasoning and a hit of our Honey Mustard, too.

ingredients.name: Burger Seasoning or Beef & Steak Seasoning
Honey Mustard , Sweet & Spicy Mustard or Dijon-style mustard

preparation: Crumble beef into a large bowl.
Using your hands, gently mix to combine evenly.
Divide mixture into 12â€“14 portions and form each into a ball. Flatten to form patties.

Individually wrap burgers, or portion into family-sized packs. Be sure to separate each burger with a piece of parchment or waxed paper. Snugly wrap with plastic, then place in freezer bags. Freeze up to 2 months.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve on a burger bun with your choice of burger toppings and with 1 cup sliced veggies.
